org.opcfoundation.ua.transport.security

Class Cert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opcfoundation.ua.transport.security.Cert

  • public class Cert
extends java.lang.Object
    Cert is a X509 certificate that contains a public key. The instance is valid and encodedable. Wrapper to Certificate.

    To Create a new certificate See CertificateUtils#generateKeyPair(String)

    Author:
    Mikko Salonen, Toni Kalajainen (toni.kalajainen@iki.fi)
